en.no_text_key: âŒ The text corresponding to the key {key} was not found, please contact the developer @AS1AW!

ChooseDino.error_not_dino: â“ | Dinosaurs are not a number, text, or emoji; they are a living creature. Please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseInt.error_not_int: â“ | By conducting a structural analysis of the data, we determined that you did not enter a number, please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseInt.error_max_int: â“ | The specified number is greater than the maximum ({number} > {max}), please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseInt.error_min_int: â“ | The specified number is less than the minimum ({number} < {min}), please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseString.error_max_len: â“ | The message length exceeds the allowed limit ({number} > {max}), please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseString.error_min_len: â“ | The message length is less than allowed ({number} < {min}), please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseConfirm.error_not_confirm: â“ | Choose one of the options provided. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseOption.error_not_option: â“ | Are you trying to go beyond the edge of the world? Don't. Choose from the available options. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

ChooseTime.zero_seconds:
â“ | You need to enter a message in the time format, use the reminder - /string_to_sec click
Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseTime.error_max_int: â“ | The time you specified is greater than the maximum ({number} > {max}), please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.
ChooseTime.error_min_int: â“ | The time you specified is less than the minimum ({number} < {min}), please try again. Or enter /cancel to cancel.

start_command.referal: ğŸ”— Noticed the transition using the relevant referral link!
start_command.first_message: ğŸ¦– | Hey {username}, glad to see you! I'm a small game bot like a tamagotchi, but with dinosaurs! ğŸ¥š | What is a tamagotchi? A tamagotchi is a game with a virtual pet that you need to feed, take care of, play with, etc. ğŸ—» | What kind of bot is this? In this bot, you will take care of your pet, travel, conquer dungeons, and fully immerse yourself in this RPG world! ğŸ® | How to start playing? Press the button ğŸ¡ Start playing! â¤ | Be ready to pay attention to your dinosaur, have a good game!

help.long: ğŸ¥ List of all commands in the bot.

cancel.long:

Ã— ğŸª€ Example: You create a product for the market, to cancel its creation at any stage - use this command.

start.long: ğŸ’¥ The first thing the bot sees from you is start, but in other cases, you can go to the main menu using this command.

profile.long: ğŸ‹ Alternative to the info command, a general summary about the user. When replying to another user's message - it will display their information. If you enter - "me", it will display your information.

promo.long: â›ï¸ Follow the news in the channel to receive promo codes more often!

en.command_dino_prof: ğŸ¥š | You currently have no dinosaurs, please check your inventory. You should have an egg in your inventory that you can incubate!

faq.text: ğŸ¿ | Hey, our bot is quite large, and there's a lot of information. Here are a couple of categories, choose what information you want to receive >

inline_buttons.game_point: â™¾ï¸ What is the game about

faq.game_point:
ğŸ¦• In DinoGochi you become the owner of a unique dinosaur. Our game combines the atmosphere of a classic Tamagotchi and RPG elements: you take care of your pet, develop its skills, participate in adventures and competitions.

ğŸ‹ However, DinoGochi is not only about care. Your path is determined by you:
- You can focus on developing your dinosaur, training it and unlocking new abilities.
- Or engage in trading rare resources, building your own economy.
- Or perhaps, you want to explore the world, participate in events, unite with other players, or compete for the title of the strongest.

âœ¨ DinoGochi is an open sandbox where you choose your own playstyle.
 Grow, trade, explore, win â€” or just enjoy life with your dinosaur.
faq.dino_mood:
ğŸˆ *What is the mood of a dinosaur?*
The mood reflects your dinosaur's overall state: how happy, satisfied, and ready for new adventures it is. Monitoring the mood is important for the pet to develop faster and be more effective in travels.

ğŸ *What does the mood depend on?*
The mood depends on your attention: play with the dinosaur, care for it, feed it your favorite dishes, and don't forget about communication. The more care â€” the better the mood!

ğŸ‘€ *Where to see the dinosaur's mood?*
You can see the current mood in your dinosaur's profile. We display it through special indicators and color labels.

ğŸ’¥ *What does good or bad mood give?*
With a good mood, the dinosaur receives useful bonuses: develops faster, fights more successfully, and handles tasks more easily. At low mood, nervous breakdowns are possible: the dinosaur may refuse to follow commands or lose motivation.
faq.dino_height:
*ğŸŒ± What's up with dinosaur growth?*
A dinosaur grows for 30 days after birth. However, each dinosaur is unique: some may grow into large creatures, while others will remain small.
faq.kindergarten:
ğŸ« *What is a kindergarten?*
Kindergarten is a premium feature that allows you to send your dinosaur to the kindergarten for a few hours a day. During this time, your pet is cared for and stays in a good mood.
faq.dino_skills:
ğŸ¯ *What are dinosaur skills?*
Skills are characteristics that directly affect your dinosaur's success in various activities. They are leveled up through training and unlock various bonuses.

ğŸŒŸ *What bonuses do skills provide?*
- With high charisma, there is a chance to cancel bad moods.
- Agility reduces the time to complete tasks.
- Charisma gives a discount on promotions.
- High charisma increases the chance of gaining additional experience in gathering food, games, travels, and sleep.
- When gathering resources, the chance of finding rarer items increases.
- In games, the dinosaur receives an additional bonus with high charisma.
- With high intelligence, there is a chance to create one more item at once.

ğŸ’ª *How to level up skills?*
Skills can be leveled up by sending the dinosaur to training. Different trainings develop different skills!
faq.settings:
âš™ï¸ *What can be configured in the game?*
Many settings are available in DinoGochi to make the game even more comfortable:

- Turn off daily reward notifications.
- Adjust inventory page size.
- Rename the dinosaur.
- Customize profile interface view.
- Delete account.
- Configure how dinosaurs will call the owner.
- Select bot language.
- Set permission to talk with the owner.
- Set nickname in the bot.
- Reset avatar.

All settings are available in a special menu section.
faq.friends:
ğŸ¤ *What are friends in DinoGochi?*
Friends allow interaction with other players and developing multiplayer gameplay. Friend features:

- View friend's profile.
- Share coins and items.
- Hatch joint dinosaurs.
- Change friend's name for convenience.
- Send dinosaurs to play together.

ğŸ‘¥ *How to become friends?*
You can add a friend through the special menu or with the command `/add_me` in the group.
faq.referal:
ğŸ’ *What is the referral system?*
The referral system allows you to earn bonuses for inviting friends to the game.

ğŸ¤ *How does the referral system work?*
After clicking the referral link, you immediately become friends with the inviting player.

ğŸ’œ *What do I get when my friend reaches level 5?*
You receive a rare or unusual egg!

â¤ï¸ *What will my friend get?*
The friend will receive the following bonuses: 255 coins, ğŸ¯ Honey Jar x2, ğŸª Cookies x2, ğŸ§¸ Teddy bear, ğŸ— Chicken leg x2, ğŸ’ Berries x2, ğŸ¦ª Small fish x2, ğŸ‚ Cake
faq.market:
ğŸª *What is a market?*
A market is a completely independent system for exchanging items and coins. Each player can customize their shop profile.

ğŸ–¼ï¸ *Can I set a profile picture in the market?*
Yes, if you have a subscription, you can set your profile picture.

ğŸ’¸ *What exchanges are available in the market?*
The following exchanges are available in the market:
- Exchange items for coins and vice versa.
- Exchange items for items.
- Auction of items, where the highest bid wins.
faq.dino_tavern:
ğŸ» *What is a tavern?*
A tavern is a place where you can get quests and hear fascinating stories.

ğŸ¯ *What can you do in a tavern?*
- Get a quest that will give you additional tasks and bonuses.
- Hear interesting stories that may provide hints for future adventures.
faq.events:
ğŸ‰ *What are events?*
Events are special events in the game that can appear both in the bot and as additional events.

ğŸ® *What types of events are there?*
- Bot events are temporary tasks and activities that appear for a certain period of time.
- Additional events may include bonuses, new mechanics, or unique items that are available for a limited time.
faq.donate:
ğŸ’– *What are donations used for?*
The funds received from players are used for the following needs:

- Payment for hosting, so the bot always works stably.
- Advertising to attract new players.
- Rewards for the work of people who are involved in the development of the bot.
- A little for treats to keep the team's motivation up.
faq.super_coins:
ğŸ’ *What are super coins?*
Super coins are a special currency that can be earned by watching ads or making donations.

ğŸ *What can you buy with super coins?*
Super coins can be spent on special items available via the command `/super`
faq.more_dinos:
ğŸ¾ *How to get more dinosaurs?*
The number of dinosaurs you can keep depends on your level and subscription:

- Every 20th level gives +1 slot for a dinosaur.
- With a premium subscription, you get +1 slot.
- There is also always 1 slot available for a shared dinosaur.
faq.craft:
âš’ï¸ *What is crafting?*
Crafting is the process of creating items using recipes and materials. Some recipes require time to create.

ğŸ“ *Where to find recipes?*
Recipes can be found at the market, from the junk dealer, or while traveling.
faq.breakdown:
ğŸ˜£ *What is a nervous breakdown in a dinosaur?*
A nervous breakdown is a state that can occur if a dinosaur is in a very bad mood.

âš ï¸ *How to prevent a nervous breakdown?*
To prevent a nervous breakdown, you need to lift the dinosaur's spirits by giving it attention, feeding it, or engaging in other activities. If this doesn't work right away, just wait, and the mood will improve over time.
faq.general:
ğŸˆ *Rarities*
Events and dinosaurs are divided into rarities.
The higher the rarity, the sweeter the reward.

 1. Common - 50%
 2. Uncommon - 25%
 3. Rare - 15%
 4. Mystical - 9%
 5. Legendary - 1%

ğŸ•¹ *Interactions*
To interact with a dinosaur, go to `ğŸ•¹ Actions`.

 1. To feed the dinosaur, you need to gather food, click on `ğŸ•¹ Actions` > `ğŸ• Gather food` and follow the instructions.

 2. To feed the dinosaur, click on `ğŸ•¹ Actions` > `ğŸ£ Feed` and choose the appropriate food.

 3. In `ğŸ® Entertainment`, you can choose a game and entertain the dinosaur to improve its mood.

 4. In `ğŸ‘ Journey`, you can find various items, meet friends, and see many interesting things!

 5. `ğŸŒ™ Put to sleep` the dinosaur needs sleep daily, don't forget to put it to bed!

ğŸ® *Profile*
 To view your inventory or check your statistics, go to `ğŸ‘â€ğŸ—¨ Profile`
faq.eat:
ğŸ¥™ *What does my dinosaur eat?*
Check your dinosaur's profile, dinosaurs live in their natural habitat.

Herbivores are where there is a lot of grass, predators in forests/jungles, and those who love fish fly in the clouds.

ğŸ• *Treats*
ğŸ¯ A jar of honey, ğŸ¥ Sweet pancakes - dinosaurs love treats and regardless of their type, they will happily eat them!

This food also gives bonuses to mood/health, etc.

You can find all the information about the item in the inventory!
faq.accessories:
ğŸ“ *Accessories*
Accessories open up additional opportunities or speed up the activity. 
Accessories can be installed while the dinosaur is doing nothing, by using it in the inventory.
Accessories can be found in travels or dungeons.

ğŸ² *Here are some of them...*
 ğŸ§¸ Teddy bear - allows you to choose sleep mode.
 ğŸ›  Tools - speed up food collection.
